DataElement.preferredName: Surgical Diagnosis To Progression Or Relapse Time in Months Number
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Duration of the length of time from surgical diagnosis to the point of disease progression or relapse, expressed as a number of months.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Surgical Diagnosis To Disease Progression Or Relapse Time in Months
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Number of calendar months from the time of surgical diagnosis to the point of disease progression or relapse.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Surgical Diagnosis Disease Progression Relapse Time
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Surgical; of or relating to or involving or used in surgery or requiring or amenable to treatment by surgery.:The process of identifying a disease by the signs and symptoms.:Cancer that continues to grow or spread.:The return of signs and symptoms of cancer after a period of improvement.:the continuum of experience in which events pass from the future through the present to the past.

Concepts.definition: Surgical; of or relating to or involving or used in surgery or requiring or amenable to treatment by surgery.

The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation.
A process that manifests as the worsening of a disease over time.
The return of signs and symptoms of cancer after a period of improvement.
The continuum of experience in which events pass from the future through the present to the past.

Property.preferredDefinition: One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar.  It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.

Concepts.definition: One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar. It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the response criteria (includes RECIST and others) and associated documentation of disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Duration of an event expressed in number of months.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a concept of quantity derived from zero and units.

Concepts.definition: A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Number of months to First Pro
ReferenceDocuments.description: Number of months to First Progression/Relapse

ReferenceDocuments.name: CCTG_01
ReferenceDocuments.description: Number of months from last scan performed post completion of initial PRRT to radiological progression per RECIST 1.1
